title: Chairman WAPDA briefs PM about progress of 10 ongoing mega projects
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 13 (APP): Chairman Water and Power Development Authority (WAPDA) Lt. Gen. Â® Muzammil Hussain called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Tuesday.
During the meeting, the Chairman WEAPDA apprised the Prime Minister about the progress of ten ongoing mega projects under WAPDA.
The Prime Minister expressed his satisfaction over the pace of projects.
